SELECT m.img, m.name, m.description, m.price, m.sales, m.type, m.id, m.set_type AS setMealId, IFNULL(o.cnt, 0) AS cnt FROM menu m LEFT JOIN (SELECT uid, mid, cnt, set_meal_id FROM orders WHERE uid = #{uid} AND status = 0 AND set_meal_id IS NOT NULL AND deleted_at IS NULL) o ON m.set_type = o.set_meal_id WHERE m.set_type = #{setType}
